column4: could anyone help me on this? i cannot play any video files right now using kaffeine+xine (or anything else plus xine, as far as i can tell.) it makes programs like kaffeine and crash. my debugging info looks like this: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/4775/   i was up all night trying to fix this and am at an end. if i am not providing enough detail, please let me know\
There's a plugin in Synaptic that gets you AVI, WMV, and other compatibility.
i don't think that is what i need.... i had videos working fine for a long time
